title: How to Fold a Rabbit Wash Cloth

steps.headline: Fold the washcloth in half to form a triangle.
steps.description: The washcloth must be square or squared off.

steps.headline: Roll the washcloth from the right angle corner to the long opposite side.
Fold the rolled washcloth in half.
Fold the washcloth in half again.
steps.description: Fold the loose ends back towards fold to start the ears.

steps.headline: Place the rubber-band around the washcloth 2 inches (5 cm) from the fold.
steps.description: Cover the rubber-band with ribbon. If giving as a gift, glue eyes and pom-pom (nose) on to the finished bunny to bring it to life.

text: Fold the washcloth in half to form a triangle. The washcloth must be square or squared off. Roll the washcloth from the right angle corner to the long opposite side.  Fold the rolled washcloth in half.  Fold the washcloth in half again. Fold the loose ends back towards fold to start the ears. Place the rubber-band around the washcloth 2 inches (5 cm) from the fold. Cover the rubber-band with ribbon. If giving as a gift, glue eyes and pom-pom (nose) on to the finished bunny to bring it to life. Finished.
sentences: Fold the washcloth in half to form a triangle.
The washcloth must be square or squared off.
Roll the washcloth from the right angle corner to the long opposite side.
Fold the rolled washcloth in half.
Fold the washcloth in half again.
Fold the loose ends back towards fold to start the ears.
Place the rubber-band around the washcloth 2 inches (5 cm) from the fold.
If giving as a gift, glue eyes and pom-pom (nose) on to the finished bunny to bring it to life.
